name: Bali (Mahabali)
shortLoreBlurb: Bali (Mahabali) is a deity/king from India (Hindu) associated with benevolence, underworld. Serves as a guardian or guide across the boundary of life and death.
description: Bali (Mahabali) is a deity/king from India (Hindu) associated with benevolence, underworld. Serves as a guardian or guide across the boundary of life and death.
